gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon HD 7900 Series (TAHITI, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.5-gentoo, LLVM 8.0.0)

Steam Overlay does not work. 
Right clicking in game makes game lose input (Alt-tabbing in & out fixes this). Right clicking is not needed to play the game (functionality is the same when shift+clicking in game)
